title: Unable to build ghostscript 9.21
body:
I'm seeing this error:

```
./obj/aux/echogs -a ./obj/ldt.tr -s -  -lm -ldl  -L/scratch/vendors/spack.20170428/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/libtiff-4.0.6-ymvv4frmgmpru6ewdkalbvibmuvoj3ur/lib -ltiff   -rdynamic -lfontconfig -lfreetype      -lpthread -lm
if [ x != x ]; then LD_RUN_PATH=; export LD_RUN_PATH; fi; \
XCFLAGS= XINCLUDE= XLDFLAGS= XLIBDIRS= XLIBS= \
PSI_FEATURE_DEVS= FEATURE_DEVS= DEVICE_DEVS= DEVICE_DEVS1= DEVICE_DEVS2= DEVICE_DEVS3= \
DEVICE_DEVS4= DEVICE_DEVS5= DEVICE_DEVS6= DEVICE_DEVS7= DEVICE_DEVS8= \
DEVICE_DEVS9= DEVICE_DEVS10= DEVICE_DEVS11= DEVICE_DEVS12= \
DEVICE_DEVS13= DEVICE_DEVS14= DEVICE_DEVS15= DEVICE_DEVS16= \
DEVICE_DEVS17= DEVICE_DEVS18= DEVICE_DEVS19= DEVICE_DEVS20= \
DEVICE_DEVS_EXTRA= \
/bin/sh <./obj/ldt.tr
/bin/ld: ./obj/pngrutil.o: undefined reference to symbol 'inflateValidate@@ZLIB_1.2.9'
/scratch/vendors/spack.20170428/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/zlib-1.2.11-hpdicdxfq5jn2ycttiuiu42hemg444nf/lib/libz.so.1: error adding symbols: DSO missing from command line
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make: *** [bin/gs] Error 1
```

I'm not familiar with building this package manually, so I 'm looking for help from the community.  Does this error look familiar to anyone?  Ghostscript appears to have its own copy of zlib so this may be an issue with their build system and not with spack.  Comments?

[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/967077/spack-build.out.txt)
[spack-build.env.txt](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/files/967078/spack-build.env.txt)
